name: GodArm (Early Demo)
description:
The God of Warfare has been disturbed, and has built a tower to enact a permanent solar eclipse. He seeks the one who stole his arm, and you are him. Climb his shifting and time bending tower in this fast-paced, combat focused "rogue-ish" game!

There is a manual in-game with controls, and a general explanation of gameplay. In order to open the manual when the game opens, simply press A on your keyboard (or the bottom button on your gamepad) and use the arrows keys to flip through the pages. The game supports use of a controller, and I would recommend using one!

This is a project I've been developing on and off for over a year now and have been having a great time making it! After a few hiatuses and bumps in the road the game has come a really long way. There is still a whole lot of work to do (a ton really), but I thought it would be a good time to release a demo and see if there is any real interest in a game like this.

If you are at all interested in supporting the development of the full-game, please visit www.patreon.com/paradiseloststudio
